summary: "TAKATA RECALL"  THERE ARE CURRENTLY 2 OPEN RECALLS - #16V081 (FEBRUARY 11, 2016) AND #16V363 (MAY 25, 2016) BEING THESE RECALLS HAVE BEEN OPEN AND NOT RESOLVED FOR OVER 1 YEAR CAUSES MY BEING EXTREMELY CONCERNED AS TO THE RESULTS OF INJURY TO INCLUDE DEATH CAUSED BY THIS. I WAS NOT NOTIFIED VIA MAIL FOR THE SOLUTION OR EVEN AN UPDATE OF THE RECALL WHICH AS THE OWNER AND PRIMARY DRIVER OF THIS VEHICLE IS NOT ACCEPTABLE. LUCKILY I HAVE NOT EXPERIENCED AN ACCIDENT WHERE THE TAKATA AIRBAGS NEED TO BE ACTIVE. I WILL NOT TAKE THE VEHICLE TO A MERCEDES DEALER BECAUSE THEY NORMALLY DO NOT PROVIDE A SOLUTION BESIDES GIVING ME ALTERNATIVES AND SELLING OTHER SERVICE ITEMS INSTEAD OUTSIDE OF ANYTHING THAT HAS TO DO WITH THE RECALLS.  I WOULD GREATLY APPRECIATE YOUR ASSISTANCE IN THIS MATTER...
